channel.title: Compiler-Maker [562] v0.1
channel.description:
Hello people of moparscape, for the last hour and a half I have been coding a compiler maker in Visual C++ for 562 because when you start a new server, it's a bitch to change all the compilers to your version, so I have made a simple program to make it a little easier (:
If you have downloaded it, please leave a comment/reply saying if you liked it, or if you got errors, please post them aswell.
The Compiler-Maker will put the batch files in the directory which the Compiler-Maker is.
That should be about it (:
Oh and if you have ANY suggestions, towards this program, or a different one, please tell me (:
Many Thanks, xHOLYx
[IMG]http://i1177.photobucket.com/albums/x357/xHOLYx/CompilerMaker.jpg[/img]
Download: [url=http://uppit.com/mej1nbrlnmrb/Compiler-Maker_v0.1.exe]http://uppit.com/mej1nbrlnmrb/Compiler-Maker_v0.1.exe[/url]
